author: Malcolm Evans
description: An Irish Whiskey Sour made special and distinctive by a salty pickle influence. So much better than a Pickle Back and as it's from Mojo, much more rock and roll.
name: Pickle Whack Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into ice-filled glass
Add pickle juice to salt, break up any lumps, store in Kilner jar
